duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare detailed cost estimates for design, materials, fabrication, equipment, permits, subcontracts, consulting fees, and installation labor.
Negotiate, review, and execute pricing and terms of agreement.
Participate in pre-bid, pre-construction, and post-project completion meetings.
Design and install commercial fire sprinkler systems.
Ensure compliance with National Fire Protection Association (NFPA) standards and regulations.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Construction Management, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
